field_speakers.processed: Susan Thornton, Governor Bob Holden, Mayor Jim Thomson, Foreign Language Association of Mississippi, Jade Chinese Music Ensemble of University of Chicago,

field_description.processed:
We are very excited to announce the finalists for USHCA's 2023 Heartland Chinese Teacher Award! Out of five finalists, three award recipients will be announced in our Virtual Award Ceremony.

We invite you to join us in celebrating not only this important program, but teachers who continue to represent excellence in world language instruction and Chinese culture in their respective Heartland States! This virtual Zoom award ceremony will be held on December 9th from 12-1 PM EST.
